attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a non-smoker and a lover of fresh air I would rather choose to sit in a smokey pub than to have to run the gauntlet every time I walk down a public street (especially those in a town centre). I am fed up of having to walk through billowing clouds of smoke and being extra vigilant to protect my clothing when passing pubs, shops and other doorways. Why should smokers who pay far more taxes (mega duty) than non-smokers be penalized?
